tossup_question: 15) PHYSICS  The spherical shape of a small drop of rain is due to?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Viscosity
X) Surface Tension
Y) Atmospheric Pressure
Z) Gravity
bonus_question: 15) PHYSICS  What is minimum escape velocity–the speed necessary to counter earth’s gravity and to break away from earth into outer space–required for a rocket to be launched into space ?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) 5 km/s
X) 9.8 km/s
Y) 11 km/s
Z) 25 km/s
